casebody.data:
2002-1877 (La. 10/25/02)

Adele George LOUVIERE and Rogers George v. Chad LOUVIERE, Jerry Larpenter, Individually and as Terrebonne Parish Sheriff. Debra Ann Deroche, Norman Joseph Deroche, Jr., and Their Two Minor Children v. Keith H. Estevens, Chief of Police of Thibodaux Police Department, City of Thibodaux Police Department, City of Thibodaux and ABC Insurance Company. And other Consolidated Cases. No. 2002-C-1877. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Theriot, Erin et al.; Theriot, Brandee; Eskind, Joseph; Eskind, Monica;— Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiora-ri and/or Review, Parish of Terrebonne, 32nd Judicial District Court Div. B, Nos. 120,515, 120,597, 120,614, 123,264, 123,265, 126,604; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No(s). 2001-CA-0089, 2001-CA-0090, 2001-CA-0091, 2001-CA-0092, 2001-CA-0093, 2001-CA-0094.

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J., would grant the writ.
